text: Saya menginap satu malam di hotel dengan melakukan pemesanan via agoda. Memesan kamar lantai teratas dan dipenuhi. Ketika saya datang, dalam kamar tidak disediakan tissu, lalu saya mencoba menghubungi house keeping untuk meminta tisu, saya tidak direspon sama sekali, kemudian saya menghubungi front Office untuk bertanya apakah setiap kamar tidak disediakan tissu? Tapi segala lambatnya respon diatas, kekecewaan saya sedikit terobati dengan hidangan sarapan yang rasa dan pilihannya membuat saya wajib merekomendasikan ke yang lain. Dan pengobat kekecewaan saya yg lain adalah disaat akan check out, saya menghubungi front office, dan ditawarkan bantuan untuk membawa koper, saya iyakan, hanya untuk melihat, seberapa cepatkah responnya, dan ternyata tidak perlu menunggu lama, bellboy pun datang dengan cepat.

text: Kami menginap sekeluarga di hotel ini saat weekend. Pengalaman saat check in sangat mengecewakan dimana prosesnya sangat lama. Saya diminta deposit lalu saya kasih credit card untuk open, kemudian receptionist cowok meminta saya untuk ttd bill stlh digesek, sy complaint kenapa open credit card harus ttd? Besoknya saya baru realize bahwa itu merupakan transaksi pembelian setelah sy dpt notifikasi dari Bank. saat check out sy minta diabatalkan transaksinya dan sy bayar cash. Infonya 14 hari baru bisa batal. OMG dimana2 sy check in jg slalu open credit card tapi itu traksaksi gantung bukan pembelian yg kemudian dibatalkan!!! Kami minta single bed namun dikasih twin, kami blg oke tapi tlg digabung pas di kamar ternyata tidak digabung. kamarnya juga bau rokok padahal receptionist blg itu no smooking room. Kamarnya warm, AC lama dinginnya. Outdoor angkringannya keren suasanya asik namun makanan angkringannya amat sangat mengecewakan, ga ada yg enak termasuk minuman ronde nya, sama sekali ga berasa jahenya. Namun positifnya adalah breakfast, ini saya kasih bintang 5. sangat bervariasi, komplit. anak2 sangat suka breakfast disini, smpe mengajak lg menginap disini. Swimming poolnya juga keren. Over all hotel ini bagus hanya staf nya yg belum well trained.

Hotel dgn bentuk yg unik di pekanbaru dgn adanya cat2 mural pd tampak bangunannya membuat kesan bangunan go green dan berkelas....

text:
Ketika saya menginap bersama keluarga di Golden Tulip Essential Pekanbaru, sambutan yang diberikan oleh staff FO salah satunya yang bernama Sanas sangat ramah kepada saya sekeluarga.

Selain itu kami juga diberikan welcome fruit sembari menunggu kamar dipersiapkan.

Menginap dan beristirahat di Golden Tulip Essential Pekanbaru terasa sangat menyenangkan. Selain kamarnya yang super bersih dan wangi, pelayanan yang diberikan oleh house keeping juga sangat baik dan cepat tanggap, saya salut dengan hotel dengan pelayanan mewah.

Tak hanya menginap, di sana juga kami bebas berenang dengan view yang sangat indah. Airnya juga sangat jernih, membuat fikiran kembali relax dan fresh.

Untuk makanan pula, berbagai menu pilihan yang sangat menggoda selera telah disediakan oleh pihak hotel.

Hal yang paling berkesan di hotel ini adalah saat saya meminta bantuan operator pada saat lewat larut malam. Saat itu jaringan Wi-Fi tidak terkoneksi dengan baik. Lalu saya menelfon operator untuk mengatasi masalah tersebut. Tidak buuh waktu lama, seorang operator bernama Shaleh langsung menuju ke kamar saya dan memperbaikinya. Meskipun dari wajahnya kelihatan lelah, namun tetap memberikan pelayanan yang maksimal kepada saya.

Operator itu juga berpesan, jika masih ada masalah jangan sungkan untuk meminta bantuan kembali.

Selama saya nginap di beberapa hotel lain, biasanya saat saya butuh bantuan di kala larut malam, operator biasanya lama mengangkat telfon dan menanggapinya agak lamban.

Sungguh ini merupakan pengalaman yang takkan terlupakan selama menginap di Golden Tulip Essential Pekanbaru. Next time, I will come back to this hotel with all my family.

Thank you and I really appreciate it!!!
title: Rekomendasi hotel terbaik di Pekanbaru

text:
My family had a staycation here in January 2017. The location is very near to the airport, but far from the city. The hotel was brand new (not more than a month old) and was giving promotional rates. Our family booked 3 rooms. Unfortunately I felt that everything about the hotel was bad, except for the breakfast.
First of all, the lobby was very hot when we arrived. The air conditioner was just not strong enough to overcome the afternoon heat. Moreover, there were still some construction works going on, causing a lot of noise. 
The check-in process was very slow. Then there was a problem with our key cards. Moreover, the receptionist did not ask if we wanted smoking or non-smoking rooms and automatically allocated us to the smoking ones. Once we entered the room, we immediately noticed the smell and requested for non-smoking ones. Eventually, the manager on duty helped us to be moved to non-smoking rooms. 
The rooms themselves were basic. They were very hot too, like the lobby. They only became cooler after evening. There was no tissue in the room. There was only one set of amenities and one pair of sandals although the room was designed for two.
We then went to swim but the swimming pool was dirty.
The breakfast was great though. The choices were great (standard hotel breakfast and tasty Indonesian cuisines) and the quality was great too.

Overall, I would say the hotel was disappointing. Maybe it was because they were newly opened. Hopefully they can improve fast.
title: Everything was bad except for the breakfast

text:
I got voucher for 1 night to stay in this hotel. So i come with my friend to staycation in this hotel. And this is my first time stay in this hotel.

Fyi, this hotel is close to airport. They have Pool in 1st floor. Restaurant in G floor (close to receptionists). They also have SPA. But unfortunately the dont have a gym area.

So far I'm happy because they've good service and hospitality. And also its really clean environtment in this hotel.

This hotel have excellent service, Friendly Staff in receptionists, Comfort and Cozy ( Instagramable on lobby area ).

And i want to tell about food. In this restaurant you will see variation menu for breakfast. I was positive surprised by the execution and the taste with low prices. The restaurant staff is friendly especially LISA (she's really good talking and humble person).

So far the weakness about this hotel is the room is not soundproof so in last night, me and my friend got a reprimand from the help desk because of disturbing people in the next room, even though they were just as noisy as us.

And also I'm a little annoyed by the mosquitoes in lobby, so the hotel should find a solution to that too.

Hope this hotel can do more improvement after this review, then if came again or hear reviews from my mutual friend, I'm not disappointed.

Ps: I'm sorry I only took pictures of food because of my busy schedule 

Thanks,
@foodisseu
title: Good for STAYCATION 🧡

text: I stayed there on 6-7 Jan to attend my friend’s wedding. I booked the room online and it was mentioned 1 way airport pick up is included. So 1 day before my arrival, I called them to inform my flight schedule. They have noted. Upon arrival no one came to pick me up. I need to call them and they said ‘they will check’ seems like they forgot to pick me up. After that a driver came and said nothing. Until I reach hotel, no one apologize about this matter. So I told the receptionist, that they forgot to pick me up. She later said sorry and no action more, no explanation or anything. She’s not friendly at all. When I called them to pick me up one day before, I requested a king bed and also non smoking room. Guess what? I didn’t get both! I was put in smoking room (without telling me upon check in) and the bed is joined twin bed to create a one big bed which is not comfortable at all! No one explain my room condition upon check in. I was too angry to file a complain and since I only stay one night I just let it go. After that I showered and found that hair dryer will be provided upon request. So I called them, it took more than 15 mins and I need to call them twice in order to get hairdryer. So disappointing! Everything become worse when I check out in the morning (check out  at 5am) and no one standby in the reception desk. A public area staff need to call the staff so he came out to the reception area. And again, the staff doesn’t smile, not friendly at all. I will never ever come back to this hotel ever! I cannot believe they are a 4 star hotel. I’ve been staying in 3 star hotel before, and they treated me much more better than this!
